charactersPlayed().details: returns all characters played by this contract (e.g. stable coin, oracle registry)

dependsOnCharacters().details: returns all the character dependencies like FEE_RECIPIENT

dependsOnRoles().details: returns all the roles dependencies of this contract like FUND_TRANSFERER

rolesPlayed().details: returns all roles played by this contract

updateMainCharacterCache(uint256).details: Updates the main character cache for a speciic character

updateRoleCache(uint256,address).details: Updates the role cache for a specific role and address

augmentStratMetadata((address,address,ui.notice: Amalgamate lending metadata with strategy metadata

batchCollectYieldValueBorrowable(uint256.notice: Collect yield and view value and borrowable jointly and in weighted avg.

batchViewValueBorrowable(uint256[],addre.notice: View value, and borrowable (average weighted by value) for a batch, jointly

batchViewYield(uint256[],address).notice: View yield jointly in a batch

collectYield(uint256,address,address).notice: Disburse yield in tranche to recipient

collectYieldValueBorrowable(uint256,addr.notice: Collect yield and view value and borrowable per 10k

configureAsset(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Set central parameters per an asset

containedIn(uint256).notice: Allows for tokens to have not just an owner address, but also container within the owner contract which they belong to

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit more collateral to the tranche

depositAndBorrow(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Deposit collateral to an existing tranche and borrow

getCurrentHoldingStrategy(uint256).notice: Retrieve current strategy and update if necessary

isAuthorized(address,uint256).notice: Check that spender is approved, owner or approved for container

isViable(uint256).notice: Check CDP against target colRatio give a pass on very small positions

migrateStrategy(uint256,address,address,.notice: Migrate assets from one strategy to another, collecting yield if any

mintDepositAndBorrow(address,address,uin.notice: Open a new CDP with collateral deposit to a strategy and borrowing

newCurrentOracle(address,address).notice: Notify contract to update oracle cache

registerDepositFor(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Endpoint for authorized fund transferer to deposit on behalf of user

setAssetDebtCeiling(address,uint256).notice: Set the debt ceiling for an asset

setFeesPer10k(address,uint256).notice: Set minting fee per an asset

setupTrancheSlot().notice: Set up an ID slot for this tranche with the id service

viewAllILMetadata(address[]).notice: View all lending metadata for all assets

viewAllStrategyMetadata().notice: View an amalgamation of all lending and all strategy metadata

viewCollateralValue(uint256).notice: View collateral value in our stable

viewCurrentHoldingStrategy(uint256).notice: View which strategy should be holding assets for a tranche, taking into account global migrations

viewILMetadata(address).notice: View lending metadata for an asset as a whole

viewPositionsByOwner(address).notice: View the metadata for all the positions held by an address

viewPositionsByTrackingPeriod(uint256).notice: View the metadata for all positions updated in a timeframe

viewTranchesByOwner(address).notice: View all the tranches of an owner

viewYield(uint256,address).notice: View accrued yield in a tranche

viewYieldValueBorrowable(uint256,address.notice: View yield value and borrowable together

withdraw(uint256,uint256,address,address.notice: Withdraw tokens from tranche, checing viability

userdoc.notice: Centerpiece of CDP: lending minted stablecoin against collateral Collateralized debt positions are expressed as ERC721 tokens (via Tranche)
